Name: id
Description: An identifier variable that uniquely identifies each response

Name: submission_date
Description: Date when the respondent submitted the survey

Name: gender_individual
Description: Gender of respondent

Name: age_individual
Description: Age of respondent

Name: education_level_individual
Description: Education level of respondent

Name: years_of_experience_individual
Description: Years of experience of respondent

Name: permanent_district_individual
Description: Permanent district of residence of the respondent.

Name: temporary_district_individual
Description: Temporary district of residence of the respondent.

Name: occpatn_shopkeeper_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "shopkeeper" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Name: sesonal_work_period

Name: left_trsm_havent_got_new_job
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "didn't get a new job" after leaving tourism sector

Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent started working on "agriculture and animal husbandry" after leaving tourism sector

Name: self_had_to_migrate_to_different_location
Description: Due to COVID-19, did you have to migrate to a different location?

Name: duration_self_temporary_migration
Description: For how long did you have to migrate to this location?

Name: self_migrated_to_district
Description: Which district have you migrated to?

Name: family_had_to_migrate_to_different_location
Description: Due to COVID-19, did your family have to migrate to a different location?

Name: family_migrated_to_district
Description: In which district is your family staying now, i.e. where have they migrated to?

Name: covid_infectn_self
Description: Have you ever been infected by COVID-19?

Name: covid_infectn_self_time
Description: When did you contract COVID-19?

Name: covid_infectn_family
Description: Have any other family members been infected by COVID-19?

Name: lost_job_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "lost job" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: lost_employment_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "lost self-employment" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: took_low_esteem_job_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "took up uninterested job (low self-esteem job)" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: worked_on_reduced_salary_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent " had to work on reduced salary " due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: worrked_on_rotational_employment_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to work on rotational employment" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: could_not_renew_licence_permit_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "couldn't renew licenses or permits" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: suffered_other_impact_due_covid
Description: Other Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "suffer any other impact" due to economic downturn brought by COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: did_not_suffer_impact_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates if the respondent "didn't suffer any impact" due to economic downturn brought by COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: full_salary_last_date
Description: When was the last time you received your full salary (or full income)?

Name: took_loan_financial_instutions_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to take loan from financial institutions" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: took_loan_friends_family_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to take loan from friends and family" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: stopped_family_education_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "stopped education of a family member " due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: stopped_family_health_services_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to stop health services for family members" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: sold_personal_assets_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to sell personal assets" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: sold_professional_assets_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to sell professional assets, gears, equipments (camera, etc.)" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: sold_land_property_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to sell land or property" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: suffered_other_econ_impact_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "had to suffer any other impact" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: did_not_suffer_econ_impact_due_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent "did not suffer any impact" due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: self_incm_chng_2020_v_2019
Description: How did your total income change in 2020 compared to 2019?

Name: thought_hard_about_covid_effects
Description: Do you have to try hard (force yourself) not to think about the effects of COVID-19 on your livelihood?

Name: felt_alert_frightened_due_covid_effects
Description: Do you find yourself being unnaturally alert, frightened or terrified thinking about the effects of COVID-19 on your livelihood?

Name: felt_isolated_from_people_environment
Description: Do you feel isolated from the people, activities and environment around you?

Name: had_bad_dreams_about_covid_effects
Description: Do you have bad dreams (or find yourself worrying unwillingly) about the ill effects of COVID-19?

Name: blamed_self_others_for_hardships_due_covid
Description: For the hardships caused by COVID-19, do you often find yourself blaming others or yourself?

Name: felt_increased_social_pressure_due_covid
Description: Have you felt that family or social pressure has increased due to COVID-19?

Name: felt_animosity_within_family_due_covid
Description: Has COVID-19 caused animosity or strife among your family members?

Name: took_mental_health_counselling_due_covid
Description: Have you taken any kind of health counseling service for the mental stress brought by COVID-19?
